opinion.court: Supreme Court of the United States
opinion.case_name: Lorenzo Willis, Etc. v. Prudential Insurance Company of America

opinion:
405 U.S. 318

92 S.Ct. 1257

31 L.Ed.2d 273

Lorenzo WILLIS, etc., petitioner,
v.
PRUDENTIAL INSURANCE COMPANY OF AMERICA.

No. 70-5344.

Supreme Court of the United States

March 20, 1972

E. Freeman Leverett, Elkerton, Ga., for petitioner.

A. Felton Jenkins, Jr., Atlanta, Ga., for respondent.

On writ of certiorari to the Supreme Court of Georgia.

PER CURIAM.

1

The judgment is affirmed by an equally divided Court.

2

Mr. Justice POWELL took no part in the consideration or decision of this case.
